title: Random Disconnects
body: I keep disconnecting from my game, my ping stays at 35-40, I watched it as the game said attempting to reconnect. I was playing earlier and it was fine, now I can't even stay in the game I just started for more then 2 minutes. Really hope I don't get leaverbuster, it's literally out of my control. Is there anything going on for anyone else?

replies.body: Thank you very much for your help porocles.I will talk with my internet provider to check my internet line.Thank you for your time again.(sorry for bad english)

Your routing to the game server seems alright, but your network could still be unstable and get cut off while in-game.  You won't get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) with just one leave, but with a history of leaving.  You should run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, and test it out in a custom.  I hope that helps!
I have the same problem after the new patch :(
I have the exact same issue last week or two it started happening, its just riot servers cuz i dont have that kind of problem in any other game, and my ping is fine, just random disconnections.

Man I've had this issue for 2 weeks at least 5 times a game. I've followed every guide I could find in the past few years about ways to fix this issue but nothing works. Let me know if you find anything that helps
